com.cube.storm

Class LanguageSettings.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.LanguageSettings.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    LanguageSettings

    public static class LanguageSettings.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    The builder class for LanguageSettings. Use this to create a new LanguageSettings instance with the customised properties specific for your project. Call build() to build the settings object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LanguageSettings.Builder(Context context)
      Default constructor

      • build

        public LanguageSettings build()
        Builds the final settings object and sets its instance. Use LanguageSettings.getInstance() to retrieve the settings instance. The languages set by #defaultLanguage(android.net.Uri) and #fallbackLanguage(android.net.Uri) are loaded at this point.
        Returns:
        The newly set LanguageSettings instance
